Richard Hamilton, Word and Image: Prints 1963-2007 and Recent Paintings by Justin Mortimer.</summary>     <published>2015-02-24T09:57:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-02-24T09:46:00Z</updated>     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/humanities/events/2015/exhibition-preview.aspx</id>     <category term="Djanogly Gallery" />     <category term="Nottingham Lakeside Arts" />     <category term="Richard Hamilton" />     <category term="Justin Mortimer" />   </entry>   <entry>     <title>CBET Workshop - The Fate of the Body After Death</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/research/groups/bible-ethics-theology/research-activities/dignity-human-body.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Nicola Caseldine</name>     </author>     <summary>A series of workshops bringing together biblical and historical perspectives with contemporary and theological points. The second workshop will focus on the fate of the body after death.</summary>     <published>2015-02-04T11:50:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-02-12T12:24:00Z</updated>     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/research/groups/bible-ethics-theology/research-activities/dignity-human-body.aspx</id>     <category term="Humanities Building" />   </entry> </feed>
